Thats pretty much the theme of pre-seasons _"Assassins op"_
Dw though, they'll fix it by buffing lethality like always.

dark harvest needs a nerf* the shaco only did 500 damage, dark harvest did the rest, that spell outclasses every other in terms of damage, averaging at 10k total damage while the electrocutes and stuff in the room are just approaching 2k.

admittedly I had dark harvest up to around 250 stacks at that point, but the damage mostly came from backstab crit, triforce, duskblade, hydra reset and e. Dark harvest only did 66 base + 242 soul essence + 40 (25% of 158 bonus ad), physical damage. 

Dark harvest does so much damage over the course of the game since it's basically extra damage whenever you attack an enemy, whereas thunderlords has a cooldown but does more damage earlier into the game, and doesn't need to be stacked.

Actually the more I think about it, dark harvest needs less base damage, making it into more of a scaling rune.

Anyway I got the damage by throwing e before I auto'd, and then auto'd and hydra'd before the e landed, for a near instant one-shot.
i know. making a point on darkharvest damage tho
